abstract: NBC Universal, majority-owned by Comcast, is hiring one of its longtime advisers, Stuart J. Epstein.
snippet: NBC Universal, majority-owned by Comcast, is hiring one of its longtime advisers, Stuart J. Epstein.
lead_paragraph: NBC Universal said on Wednesday that it had hired Stuart J. Epstein, the head of Morgan Stanley‘s media and communications banking group, as its chief financial officer.

headline.main: NBC Universal Hires Top Morgan Stanley Media Banker

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
